Title: Neverland
Plot: Pacey hopes taking Dawson to their favorite childhood camping spot will help ease the pain when he tells Dawson about his new feelings for Joey. Meanwhile, Joey deals with the emotional fallout from her kiss with Pacey by spending girls' night out with Jen and Andie, but to Jen's surprise they stumble upon a birthday party for Henry that she wasn't invited to.
GuestStars: Jonathan Lipnicki, Raymond J. Revnyak Jr., Alex Wharf, Patrick Stogner
